name: Arkhan the Black Mortarch of Sacrament
flavorText: Arkhan is a master of necromantic magic and the most trusted servant of Nagash. Roiling clouds of deathly magic swirl about the skeletal form of the Mortarch of Sacrament as he rides to war upon his dread abyssal Razarak.
description: Arkhan the Black is a named character that is a single model. He is armed with Zefet-kar and Khenash-an.

characteristics.name: MOUNT
characteristics.description: Arkhan the Black’s dread abyssal, Razarak, attacks with its Ebon Claws.

characteristics.name: COMPANION
characteristics.description: Arkhan the Black is accompanied by a host of spirits that attack with their Spectral Claws and Daggers. For rules purposes, they are treated in the same manner as a mount.

characteristics.name: FLY
characteristics.description: Arkhan the Black can fly.

characteristics.name: WARMASTER
characteristics.description: If this unit is included in an Ossiarch Bonereapers army, it is treated as a general even if it is not the model picked to be the army’s general.

abilities.name: Feaster of Souls
abilities.flavorText: Arkhan feeds upon the soul-stuff of the slain, restoring any damage done to his physical form.
abilities.description: At the end of the combat phase, if any enemy models were slain by wounds inflicted by this model’s attacks in that combat phase, you can heal up to 2 wounds allocated to this model.

abilities.name: Frightful Touch
abilities.flavorText: The malign spirits that surround Arkhan can freeze an opponent’s blood with a single touch.
abilities.description: If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with this model’s Spectral Claws and Daggers is 6, that attack inflicts 1 mortal wound on the target and the attack sequence ends (do not make a wound or save roll).

abilities.name: Staff of SpiritsArcane Bolt
abilities.flavorText: Khenash-an, the Staff of Spirits, is used by Arkhan to empower the spells he casts.
abilities.description: Staff of Spirits: Add the Staff of Spirits value shown on this model’s damage table to casting, dispelling and unbinding rolls for this model. In addition, this model can attempt to cast Arcane Bolt any number of times in the same hero phase, even if another WIZARD has already  attempted to cast the spell in that phase.

abilities.name: Mortarch of Sacrament
abilities.flavorText: Arkhan is the most trusted of Nagash’s followers, and as such knows the secrets of his unholy necromantic rites.
abilities.description: At the start of your hero phase, if this model is on the battlefield you can pick up to 4 different friendly SUMMONABLE units or friendly OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS units, in any combination, that are wholly within 24" of this model. For each of those units, you can either heal up to 3 wounds allocated to that unit or, if no wounds are allocated to it, you can return a number of slain models to that unit with a combined Wounds characteristic of 3 or less.

abilities.name: Arcane BoltMystic ShieldCurse of Years
abilities.description: Arkhan the Black is a WIZARD. He can attempt to cast 3 spells in your hero phase and attempt to unbind 3 spells in the enemy hero phase. He knows the Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield and Curse of Years spells.

abilities.name: First of the Mortarchs
abilities.flavorText: Arkhan’s mastery of the dread art of necromancy is superior to even that of his fellow Mortarchs. He is so steeped in deathly sorcery that his presence bolsters the skill of those wizards around him.
abilities.description: You can use this command ability at the start of your hero phase if this model is on the battlefield. If you do so, until the end of that phase you can add 6" to the range of spells cast by friendly DEATH WIZARDS while they are within 18" of this model. You cannot pick the same unit to benefit from this command ability more than once per hero phase.

name: Nagash Supreme Lord of the Undead
flavorText: Nagash is the Great Necromancer, Supreme Lord of the Undead and master of all that passes beyond the mortal coil. He is nothing less than an evil-hearted god, and those who earn his displeasure are soon turned to dust upon the wind.

name: Arch Kavalos Zandtos
flavorText: Known and feared as the Dark Lance of Ossia, Zandtos has a burning hatred for the living that Nagash has stoked to the point of obsession. Those with the temerity to invade Shyish bear the full brunt of his undying wrath.
description: Arch-Kavalos Zandtos is a named character that is a single model. He is armed with the Dark Lance and a Nadirite Battle-shield.

characteristics.name: MOUNT
characteristics.description: Zandtos’ Kavalos steed attacks with its Hooves, Teeth and Barbed Tails.

abilities.name: The Dark Lance
abilities.flavorText: The spear that Zandtos wields can inflict truly terrible wounds on the charge.
abilities.description: The Dark Lance has a Damage characteristic of 3 instead of 2 if this model made a charge move in the same turn.

abilities.name: Hatred of the Living
abilities.flavorText: Zandtos has a deep loathing of all living creatures, especially those who are followers of the Chaos Gods.
abilities.description: Re-roll wound rolls of 1 for attacks made by this model that target ORDER and DESTRUCTION units. You can re-roll any wound rolls for attacks made by this model that target CHAOS units.

abilities.name: Unstoppable Charge
abilities.flavorText: When a Kavalos steed charges the foe, it can use its size and weight to smash the enemy to the ground and crush them beneath its nadirite-shod hooves.
abilities.description: After this model makes a charge move, you can pick 1 enemy unit within 1" of this model and roll a number of dice equal to the charge roll for that charge move. For each 6, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound. In addition, this model can move an extra 3" when it piles in if it made a charge move in the same turn.

abilities.name: Endless Duty
abilities.flavorText: The service an Ossiarch Boneaper owes their liege never, ever ends; if so ordered, they will continue striking at the foe with relentless regularity until no one is left to oppose them.
abilities.description: You can use this command ability in your shooting phase or any combat phase. If you do so, pick 1 friendly OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS unit that is wholly within 12" of a model with this command ability. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of weapons used by that unit in that phase. You cannot pick the same unit to benefit from this command ability more than once per phase.

abilities.name: Still Their Breath!
abilities.flavorText: Zandtos can inspire the hatred he harbours for mortals within those whom he commands.
abilities.description: You can use this command ability in your shooting phase or any combat phase. If you do so, pick 1 friendly MORTIS PRAETORIANS unit that is wholly within 24" of this model. Re-roll wound rolls of 1 for attacks made by that unit that target ORDER and DESTRUCTION units until the end of that phase. You can re-roll any wound rolls for attacks made by that unit that target CHAOS units until the end of that phase.

name: Katakros Mortarch of the Necropolis
flavorText: Orpheon Katakros is an immortal demigod of war. A military genius, he is a consummate commander; in conjunction with his trusted retainers, he bolsters the Ossiarch legions with iron resolve, surging physical power and uncanny insight.
description: Katakros is a named character that is a single model. He is armed with Inda-Khaat and the Shield Immortis.

characteristics.name: WARMASTER
characteristics.description: If this unit is included in an Ossiarch Bonereapers army, it is treated as a general even if it is not the model picked to be the army’s general.

abilities.name: Deadly Combination
abilities.flavorText: Katakros can send a foe staggering with a blow from the Shield Immortis and exploit the opening with a follow-up strike from his glaive, Inda-Khaat.
abilities.description: If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with the Shield Immortis is 6, that attack inflicts 2 mortal wounds on the target in addition to any normal damage.

abilities.name: Mortarch of the Necropolis
abilities.flavorText: Katakros is the most perfect of Nagash’s constructs and ruler of the Ossiarch Empire.
abilities.description: At the start of your hero phase, if this model is on the battlefield you can pick up to 3 different friendly OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS units wholly within 24" of this model. For each of those units, you can either heal up to 3 wounds allocated to that unit or, if no wounds are allocated to it, you can return a number of slain models to that unit with a combined Wounds characteristic of 3 or less.

abilities.name: Nadirite Weapons
abilities.flavorText: Nadirite weapons can steal an opponent’s life-force.
abilities.description: If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a Nadirite weapon is 6, that attack scores 2 hits on the target instead of 1. Make a wound and save roll for each hit.

abilities.name: Endless Duty
abilities.flavorText: The service an Ossiarch Boneaper owes their liege never, ever ends; if so ordered, they will continue striking at the foe with relentless regularity until no one is left to oppose them.
abilities.description: You can use this command ability in your shooting phase or any combat phase. If you do so, pick 1 friendly OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS unit that is wholly within 12" of a model with this command ability. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of weapons used by that unit in that phase. You cannot pick the same unit to benefit from this command ability more than once per phase.

abilities.name: Supreme Lord of the Bonereaper Legions
abilities.flavorText: An Ossiarch force personally led by Katakros is said to be worth ten times the number of an identical force led by his generals.
abilities.description: You can use this command ability in your hero phase if KATAKROS is your general. If you do so, until your next hero phase, add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by friendly OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS units while they are wholly within 18" of this model, and add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target friendly MORTIS PRAETORIAN units while they are wholly within 18" of this model. You can only use this command ability once per hero phase.

name: Liege Kavalos
flavorText: A Liege-Kavalos is a cavalry commander of uncanny skill and resilience. At a harsh order he can drive his Bonereapers to redouble their attack, hacking into the enemy ranks even as he fells dangerous foes with his commander’s blade and battle-shield.
description: A Liege-Kavalos is a single model armed with a Commander’s Blade and Nadirite Battle-shield.

characteristics.name: MOUNT
characteristics.description: This model’s Kavalos steed attacks with its Hooves, Teeth and Barbed Tails.

abilities.name: Unstoppable Charge
abilities.flavorText: When a Kavalos steed charges the foe, it can use its size and weight to smash the enemy to the ground and crush them beneath its nadirite-shod hooves.
abilities.description: After this model makes a charge move, you can pick 1 enemy unit within 1" of this model and roll a number of dice equal to the charge roll for that charge move. For each 6, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound. In addition, this model can move an extra 3" when it piles in if it made a charge move in the same turn.

abilities.name: Endless Duty
abilities.flavorText: The service an Ossiarch Boneaper owes their liege never, ever ends; if so ordered, they will continue striking at the foe with relentless regularity until no one is left to oppose them.
abilities.description: You can use this command ability in your shooting phase or any combat phase. If you do so, pick 1 friendly OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS unit that is wholly within 12" of a model with this command ability. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of weapons used by that unit in that phase. You cannot pick the same unit to benefit from this command ability more than once per phase.

name: Mortisan Boneshaper
flavorText: The Boneshaper’s art is that of creation, not destruction. Though their ossified talons can rake through flesh, and though they can summon a gale of sharp bone splinters at will, they focus their efforts on regenerating the Ossiarch regiments around them.
description: A Mortisan Boneshaper is a single model armed with Ossified Talons.

abilities.name: Boneshaper
abilities.flavorText: The caster uses their arcane arts to form shattered bones into new Ossiarch Bonereaper constructs.
abilities.description: In your hero phase, you can pick 1 friendly OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS unit within 6" of this model. You can either heal up to 3 wounds that have been allocated to that unit or, if no wounds have been allocated to the unit, you can return a number of slain models to it that have a combined Wounds characteristic of 3 or less.

abilities.name: Arcane BoltMystic ShieldShard-storm
abilities.description: This model is a WIZARD. It can attempt to cast 1 spell in your hero phase and attempt to unbind 1 spell in the enemy hero phase. It knows the Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield and Shard-storm spells.

abilities.name: Shard-storm
abilities.flavorText: The caster conjures forth a great cloud of bone-shards and hurls them at the foe.
abilities.description: Shard-storm has a casting value of 5. If successfully cast, pick 1 enemy unit and roll 1 dice for each model from that unit that is within 18" of the caster and visible to them. For each 6, that unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

name: Mortisan Soulmason
flavorText: Captive souls are fodder for the most gifted of the Mortisan spirit-crafters. Borne to war upon thrones of bodily remains with their own vicious animus, the Soulmasons focus the animating energies of necromancy into their Bonereaper creations.
description: A Mortisan Soulmason is a single model armed with a Soulmason’s Staff.

characteristics.name: MOUNT
characteristics.description: This model’s Mortek Throne attacks with its Ossified Claws.

abilities.name: Mortek ThroneSoul-guideSoul-guide
abilities.flavorText: The throne upon which a Soulmason sits is saturated with arcane power channelled from Nagashizzar.
abilities.description: Mortek Throne: At the end of your hero phase, roll a dice for this model. On a 1, nothing happens. On a 2-5, this model can attempt to cast Soul-guide even if a casting attempt has already been made for that spell in the same phase. On a 6, this model can attempt to cast Soul-guide D3 more times even if a casting attempt has already been made for that spell in the same phase.

abilities.name: Arcane BoltMystic ShieldSoul-guide
abilities.description: This model is a WIZARD. It can attempt to cast 2 spells in your hero phase and attempt to unbind 2 spells in the enemy hero phase. It knows the Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield and Soul-guide spells.

abilities.name: Soul-guide
abilities.flavorText: The caster empowers and focuses the souls that animate a nearby regiment of Ossiarch Bonereaper warriors.
abilities.description: Soul-guide has a casting value of 6. If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS unit wholly within 24" of the caster that is visible to them. You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for attacks made by that unit until your next hero phase.

name: Mortisan Soulreaper
flavorText: The Soulreapers are the most destructive members of the Mortisan order. It is their role to cut the souls from the enemy with their magical scythes, though at need they can discharge a blast of captured spirit energy to destroy nearby foes.
description: A Mortisan Soulreaper is a single model armed with a Soulreaper Scythe.

abilities.name: Deathly Touch
abilities.flavorText: Even the smallest cut from a soulreaper scythe can steal the soul from a victim’s body.
abilities.description: If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a Soulreaper Scythe is 6, that attack inflicts 2 mortal wounds on the target and the attack sequence ends (do not make a wound or save roll).

abilities.name: Soulreaper
abilities.flavorText: A soulreaper scythe can be swung in great sweeping arcs that cut down the enemy like grass.
abilities.description: You can re-roll hit rolls for attacks made with a Soulreaper Scythe if the target unit has 5 or more models.

abilities.name: Arcane BoltMystic ShieldSoul-blast
abilities.description: This model is a WIZARD. It can attempt to cast 1 spell in your hero phase and attempt to unbind 1 spell in the enemy hero phase. It knows the Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield and Soul-blast spells.

abilities.name: Soul-blast
abilities.flavorText: The caster draws upon the power of captured souls to unleash a wave of necrotic energy that engulfs nearby foes.
abilities.description: Soul-blast has a casting value of 7. If successfully cast, you can either roll 1 dice for each enemy unit within 3" of the caster or roll 1 dice for 1 enemy unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. On a 1, nothing happens. On a 2-3, that unit suffers 1 mortal wound. On a 4+, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

name: Vokmortian Master of the Bone tithe
flavorText: It is Vokmortian’s task to oversee the harvesting of bones for the Ossiarch legions, a duty he undertakes with ruthless, calculating precision. Those who defy the will of the Great Necromancer are cut down with flesh-withering bolts of necromantic magic.
description: Vokmortian, Master of the Bone-tithe is a named character that is a single model. He is armed with the Staff of Retribution and the Gaze of Death.

abilities.name: Contract of Nagash
abilities.flavorText: A contract of Nagash binds the signatory to Vokmortian’s command.
abilities.description: At the start of the combat phase, roll a dice. On a 5+, you can pick 1 enemy model within 3" of VOKMORTIAN. That enemy model cannot attack VOKMORTIAN in that combat phase.

abilities.name: Grim Warnings
abilities.flavorText: The heads of those that dared to disobey Vokmortian hang from his staff.
abilities.description: Subtract 1 from the Bravery characteristic of enemy units while they are within 12" of this model, and subtract 1 from unbinding rolls for WIZARDS attempting to unbind a spell cast by this model. If an enemy general is slain within 3" of this model, for the rest of the battle subtract 2 from the Bravery of enemy units within 12" of this model instead of 1, and subtract 2 from unbinding rolls for WIZARDS attempting to unbind a spell cast by this model instead of 1.

abilities.name: Arcane BoltMystic ShieldMortal Touch
abilities.description: Vokmortian is a WIZARD. He can attempt to cast 2 spells in your hero phase and attempt to unbind 2 spells in the enemy hero phase. He knows the Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield and Mortal Touch spells.

abilities.name: Mortal Touch
abilities.flavorText: Dark light surrounds the caster’s fingers, and one touch means death.
abilities.description: Mortal Touch has a casting value of 8. If successfully cast, pick 1 enemy model within 1" of the caster that is visible to them and roll a dice. On a 5+, that model is slain. The range of this spell cannot be modified.

name: Mir Kainan
flavorText: Mir Kainan is a brutal enforcer of the Mortisans, fanatically devoted to ensuring the bone tithe is met. Certainly, any confronted by this osseous goliath soon seem to dredge up outstanding ‘payments’ – better that than face the annihilating swing of Kainan’s axe.
description: Mir Kainan is a named character that is a single model. He is armed with a Soulreaper Axe.

abilities.name: Executioner’s Strike
abilities.flavorText: Mir Kainan can remove a victim’s head from their body with a single precise strike of his axe.
abilities.description: If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a Soulreaper Axe is 6, that attack inflicts D3+1 mortal wounds on the target and the attack sequence ends (do not make a wound or save roll).

abilities.name: Arcane BoltMystic Shield
abilities.description: Mir Kainan is a WIZARD. He can attempt to cast 1 spell in your hero phase and attempt to unbind 1 spell in the enemy hero phase. He knows the Arcane Bolt and Mystic Shield spells.

pitchedBattleNotes: Unique. Mir Kainan and Kainan’s Reapers must be taken as a set. Although taken as a set

name: Kavalos Deathriders
flavorText: The heavy cavalry of the Ossiarch Bonereaper legions, the Kavalos Deathriders are expert riders mounted on macabre armoured steeds. They clatter into the foe in a wedge formation, breaking battlelines with every ferocious charge.
description: A unit of Kavalos Deathriders can have any number of models. The unit is armed with one of the following weapon options: Nadirite Blade and Shield; or Nadirite Spear and Shield.

characteristics.name: MOUNT
characteristics.description: This unit’s Kavalos Steeds attack with their Hooves and Teeth.

characteristics.name: NECROPHOROS
characteristics.description: 1 in every 5 models in this unit can be a Necrophoros. Add 1 to run rolls and charge rolls for a unit that includes any Necrophoroi.

characteristics.name: MORTEK HEKATOS
characteristics.description: 1 model in this unit can be a Mortek Hekatos. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s Nadirite Blade or Nadirite Spear.

abilities.name: Nadirite Weapons
abilities.flavorText: Nadirite weapons can steal an opponent’s life-force.
abilities.description: If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with this unit’s Nadirite Blades or Nadirite Spears is 6, that attack scores 2 hits on the target instead of 1. Make a wound and save roll for each hit. For attacks made with Nadirite Spears, 2 hits are scored on a 5+ instead of 6 if this unit made a charge move in the same turn.

abilities.name: Deathrider Wedge
abilities.flavorText: Kavalos Deathriders can charge in a deadly arrowhead formation.
abilities.description: You can use this command ability when a friendly KAVALOS DEATHRIDERS unit that includes a Mortek Hekatos finishes a charge move. You can pick 1 enemy unit within 1" of that KAVALOS DEATHRIDERS unit and roll a number of dice equal to the number of models in that KAVALOS DEATHRIDERS unit. For each 5+, the enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound. In addition, in the following combat phase, that KAVALOS DEATHRIDERS unit can move an extra 3" when it piles in. The same unit cannot benefit from this command ability more than once per turn.

name: Mortek Guard
flavorText: The Mortek Guard are soul-constructs created to dominate the battlefield. Armed with life-draining nadirite weapons and shaped from impenetrable osseous armour, they grind the enemy to dust beneath their relentless march.
description: A unit of Mortek Guard has any number of models. The unit is armed with one of the following weapon options: Nadirite Blade and Shield; or Nadirite Spear and Shield. 1 in every 10 models can replace the unit’s weapon option with a Soulcleaver Greatblade.

characteristics.name: NECROPHOROS
characteristics.description: 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be a Necrophoros. Add 1 to run and charge rolls for a unit that includes any Necrophoroi.

characteristics.name: MORTEK HEKATOS
characteristics.description: 1 model in this unit can be a Mortek Hekatos. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s melee weapon.

abilities.name: Nadirite Weapons
abilities.flavorText: Nadirite weapons can steal an opponent’s life-force.
abilities.description: If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with this unit’s Nadirite Blades or Nadirite Spears is 6, that attack scores 2 hits on the target instead of 1. Make a wound and save roll for each hit.

abilities.name: Shieldwall
abilities.flavorText: At their leader’s command, the regiment locks their shields to form an impenetrable barrier.
abilities.description: You can use this command ability at the start of the combat phase. If you do so, pick 1 friendly MORTEK GUARD unit that includes a Mortek Hekatos. You can re-roll save rolls for attacks that target that unit until the end of that combat phase.

name: Immortis Guard
flavorText: Towering over the rank and file Bonereapers, the Immortis Guard form a tough physical bulwark around the leaders of the Ossiarch cohorts. Those who come too close are hurled back by shields, then swiftly impaled on spiked halberds.
description: A unit of Immortis Guard can have any number of models, each armed with a Dread Halberd and Nadirite Battle-shield.

characteristics.name: ELITE
characteristics.description: Models in this unit can issue commands to their own unit.

abilities.name: Deadly Combination
abilities.flavorText: An Immortis Guard can send a foe staggering with a blow from their shield and exploit the opening with a follow-up strike from their halberd.
abilities.description: If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a Nadirite Battle-shield is 6, that attack inflicts 1 mortal wound on the target in addition to any normal damage.

abilities.name: Soulbound Protectors
abilities.flavorText: Immortis Guard will use their own bodies to shield their rulers from harm if necessary.
abilities.description: Roll a dice before you allocate a wound or mortal wound to a friendly OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS HERO while it is within 3" of any friendly units with this ability. On a 2+, you must allocate that wound or mortal wound to a friendly unit with this ability that is within 3" of that OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS HERO instead of allocating it to that OSSIARCH BONEREAPERS HERO.

abilities.name: Crushing Assault
abilities.flavorText: At an unspoken command, the Immortis Guard attack as one, striking down whole ranks of the foe before advancing in lockstep and then using their shields to crush their prone and reeling opponents.
abilities.description: You can use this command ability in your combat phase after a friendly IMMORTIS GUARD unit has fought in that phase for the first time. If you do so, if that unit is within 3" of an enemy unit, it can make a pile-in move and then attack with its Nadirite Battle-shields for a second time.

pitchedBattleNotes: Battleline if general is MORTISAN

name: Morghast Archai
flavorText: The Morghast Archai were crafted by Nagash himself to act as both personal guard and executioners. They soar into battle like omens of death, ignoring the feeble strikes and missiles that deflect from their soul-forged armour.
description: A unit of Morghast Archai has any number of models. The unit is armed with one of the following weapon options: Spirit Halberd; or Spirit Swords.

characteristics.name: ELITE
characteristics.description: Models in this unit can issue commands to their own unit.

characteristics.name: FLY
characteristics.description: This unit can fly.

abilities.name: Heralds of the Accursed One
abilities.flavorText: The knowledge that the Morghasts are heralds of Nagash fills their foes with fear.
abilities.description: Subtract 1 from the Bravery characteristic of enemy units while they are within 6" of any friendly MORGHASTS.

abilities.name: Ebon-wrought Armour
abilities.flavorText: The magically forged armour worn by Morghast Archai can turn aside arcane attacks.
abilities.description: Each time you allocate a mortal wound to this unit, roll a dice. On a 5+, that mortal wound is negated.

name: Morghast Harbingers
flavorText: Morghast Harbingers are used as swift-striking shock troops in the Ossiarch legions, darting in with terrifying speed for such monstrous creatures. They descend from the skies like macabre angels, then butcher the foe with their darksome blades.
description: A unit of Morghast Harbingers has any number of models. The unit is armed with one of the following weapon options: Spirit Halberd; or Spirit Swords.

characteristics.name: ELITE
characteristics.description: Models in this unit can issue commands to their own unit.

characteristics.name: FLY
characteristics.description: This unit can fly.

abilities.name: Heralds of the Accursed One
abilities.flavorText: The knowledge that the Morghasts are heralds of Nagash fills their foes with fear.
abilities.description: Subtract 1 from the Bravery characteristic of enemy units while they are within 6" of any friendly MORGHASTS.

abilities.name: Harbingers of Death
abilities.flavorText: Morghast Harbingers hurl themselves at the foe with unbridled ferocity.
abilities.description: You can attempt to charge with this unit if it is within 18" of the enemy instead of 12". Roll 3D6 instead of 2D6 when making a charge roll for this unit.

name: Necropolis Stalkers
flavorText: Four-armed horrors that possess the gestalt essence of master duellists, Necropolis Stalkers leap and spin into battle with terrifying speed, switching stance and form in the blink of an eye as they dismember their foes.
description: A unit of Necropolis Stalkers has any number of models, each armed with Spirit Blades. 1 in every 3 models can replace their Spirit Blades with Dread Falchions.

characteristics.name: ELITE
characteristics.description: Models in this unit can issue commands to their own unit.

abilities.name: Quadrarch Aspects
abilities.flavorText: Stalkers are imbued with a powerful skill by whichever of their four skulls faces the foe.
abilities.description: At the start of each combat phase, you must pick one of the following aspects for this unit. The rule for that aspect applies to this unit until the end of that phase.Blade-strike Aspect: You can re-roll hit rolls for attacks made by this unit.Blade-parry Aspect: You can re-roll save rolls for attacks that target this unit.Destroyer Aspect: You can re-roll wound rolls for attacks made by this unit.Precision Aspect: Improve the Rend and Damage characteristics of this unit’s melee weapons by 1.

abilities.name: Hunt and Kill
abilities.flavorText: You can use this command ability at the start of your hero phase.
abilities.description: You can use this command ability at the start of your hero phase. If you do so, pick 1 friendly NECROPOLIS STALKERS unit. You can re-roll run and charge rolls for that unit until your next hero phase. In addition, until your next hero phase, when that unit makes a move, it can pass across terrain features in the same manner as a model that can fly.

pitchedBattleNotes: Battleline if general is MORTISAN

name: Kainan s Reapers
flavorText: The Reapers serve as Mir Kainan’s heralds, a cadre of elite Mortek Guard who back up the enforcer’s demands with clinical violence. Wielding the finest nadirite wargear, they cut down their opponents without hesitation or remorse – exemplars of the Bonereapers’ dark efficiency
description: Kainan’s Reapers is a unit that has 5 models. Binar Khenta is armed with a Nadirite Halberd; Senha is armed with a Nadirite Blade and Shield; Nohem is armed with a Nadirite Bow and Nadirite Dagger; Hakor is armed with a Soulcleaver Greatblade; and Karu is armed with a Nadirite Club and Shield.

abilities.name: Nadirite Shields
abilities.flavorText: Senha and Karu use their shields to form an impenetrable barrier.
abilities.description: You can re-roll save rolls for this unit while this unit includes 2 models with Shields.

abilities.name: Nadirite Weapons
abilities.flavorText: Nadirite weapons can steal an opponent’s life-force.
abilities.description: If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a Nadirite weapon is 6, that attack scores 2 hits on the target instead of 1. Make a wound and save roll for each hit.

pitchedBattleNotes: Unique. Mir Kainan and Kainan’s Reapers must be taken as a set. Although taken as a set

name: Gothizzar Harvester
flavorText: The Gothizzar Harvester collects the remains of the slain, stripping them of flesh and storing them in a gaping cage of bone on its back. They bludgeon and cleave those in reach of their primary arms even as their secondary limbs gather the dead.
description: A Gothizzar Harvester is a single model armed with one of the following weapon options: Soulcrusher Bludgeons, Ossified Hooves and Tail, and Death’s Head Maw; or Soulcleaver Sickles, Ossified Hooves and Tail, and Death’s Head Maw.

abilities.name: Soulcrusher Bludgeons
abilities.flavorText: If a Soulcrusher Bludgeon strikes a target full-on, the impact of the blow can drive the target’s very soul from their body.
abilities.description: If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with Soulcrusher Bludgeons is 6, that attack inflicts 2 mortal wounds on the target and the attack sequence ends (do not make a wound or save roll).

abilities.name: Soulcleaver Sickles
abilities.flavorText: Soulcleaver Sickles can cut down whole ranks of warriors with a single scything blow.
abilities.description: Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made with Soulreaver Sickles if the target unit has 5 or more models.

name: Mortek Crawler
flavorText: An unliving artillery piece that moves with centipedal ripples as it creeps towards the perfect vantage point, the Mortek Crawler is a dread catapult that can fire a variety of unnatural ammunition types. Each brings its own hideous brand of death.
description: A Mortek Crawler is a single model armed with a Dread Catapult.

characteristics.name: CREW
characteristics.description: This model has a crew of Mortek Engineers that attack with Crawler Tools. For rules purposes, the crew are treated in the same manner as a mount.

name: Bone tithe Nexus
flavorText: The Ossiarch tithemasters often demand their grisly bounty be left at designated nexuses of power. The soul energy and raw bone of these sites can be drawn upon to heal nearby Ossiarch constructs. If the vassals and mortals nearby refuse the tithe or break contract, the statue at the nexus’ heart lets loose its deadly gaze.

name: Bone tithe Shrieker
flavorText: The Bone-tithe Shrieker is a four-headed, all-seeing monstrosity conjured to hunt down those who would escape the Ossiarch tithe. When it locates its quarry it will give vent to an awful, mind-chilling scream that dulls the wits and shivers the bones of those living creatures nearby, making them easy prey for the Ossiarchs themselves.

name: Nightmare Predator
flavorText: The Nightmare Predator is a looming conjuration of Shyishan magic that takes the form of a disturbing terror. Bonded to its caster, it floats eerily through the air towards its master’s chosen prey, lacerating the flesh of its screaming victims with claws the size of sickles before stripping them to the bone.

name: Soulstealer Carrion
flavorText: The Soulstealer Carrion is a soul-linked construct that soars from its caster’s spread fingertips to take wing above the battlefield. Its caster can see through the avian conjuration’s eyes; when it perceives spiritual energy unclaimed, it will swoop down to capture it and either channel it back to its caster or blast it outwards to harm those enemies nearby.
